reviewText: Very good documentary on the photographers and videographers on the North Shore of Oahu.  Interviews with both the visual folks and the surfers bring a good depth to the film.
Enjoyed every min of it.. The Hoffman bros do an amazing job of bringing the viewer into the world of the surf cameraman.. If u haven't seen this, you need to
A brilliant, insightful and exceptional documentary on the other side of the camera.  Probably one of the best sound tracks on a documentary I heard in awhile.
Documentary about the surf industry from the view of a photog and surfer.  Well Made. Great footage, and starts of the industry make this a must see surf film
